ygData.subject: [corpse retrieval]
ygData.msgSnippet: This may sound stupid, but how can you make commands like /corpse or /loc into hotkeys? I have been trying to figure it out since I set up my keys, but haven t
ygData.messageBody:
This may sound stupid, but how can you make commands like /corpse or /loc
into hotkeys? I have been trying to figure it out since I set up my keys,
but haven't been able to do it. Any help would be appreciated, thanks.

At 11:05 PM 5/11/99 -0500, you wrote:
>Here is a handy tip for those of you who die in line of sight of KOS NPC's.
I >discovered this with my druid character who can cast camo. Get someone
to cast >invis or camo on you. Make the /corpse command a hotkey. Get near
your corpse >and drag it along to a safe spot in the zone by contiually
clicking the hotkey >with your mouse. Your invis will not wear off until
you right click on your >corpse.
